utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you looking at naked tribe's women?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know, I know, but look at the knobs on her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, when you're subletting an apartment from your wife's cousin and then you get a divorce, sometimes the cousin suddenly wants his apartment back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How can he do that? Didn't you sign a lease?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who needs a lease when it's family!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you can stay with us! We'll take care of ya!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, yeah! Absolutely! Anything you need man! But you have to promise me the second you are feeling better so that we can make fun of your hair!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks you guys, I really appreciate this. All right, I'm gonna get packing again. Man, I've been moving around so much I'm beginning to feel like a nomad.

utterance.speaker: Health Inspector
utterance.content: Wow, Monica, if every restaurant is as clean as yours, I'd have a tough time making a living.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, do health inspectors work on commission?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah! I'd let him check out my kitchen floors.

utterance.speaker: Larry
utterance.content: A 98. I deducted 2 points because you are not wearing your chef's hat, and that is a Section 5 violation.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh, look, Larry honey, umm, I wrote the book on Section 5 and I know that you don't have to wear your hat unless you're in the kitchen.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's in the kitchen, I'll go get it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, you should really read that book you wrote. Wow! You saw the hat in the kitchen and knew that she'd have to go in there hatless to get it. You can have your own health inspector detective show!

utterance.speaker: Larry
utterance.content: Oh, I don't know about that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, but then I can be you sidekick Vunda.

utterance.speaker: Larry
utterance.content: Maybe uh, Vunda could give me her number and I can ask her to dinner sometime.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, she would love that! Y'know, 'cause you know all the clean places to eat.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How's Ross doing? Y'know since all the Emily stuff.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He's not great umm, but he's dealing with it. Oh wait a minute, you're not gonna try…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, honey, please, no, I can't get started with all that Ross stuff again. I mean, he's gonna screwed up for a looong time. And besides y'know, I don't, I don't go for guys right after they get divorced.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Right, you only go for them 5 minutes before they get married.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Two pounds of Moca Java please.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Danny. Are you guys ever gonna go out again?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know! He hasn't called me since that one time when we went out. I see him in the hallway, we flirt, I'm all ha-ha-ha-ha, and nothing.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Uh, actually, actually, I'm having a party at my place on Saturday, it's sort of a house warming kind of thing.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm really looking forward to it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I guess we won't be warming his house.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. All right, I see what he's doing! He's not asking me out, because he wants me to ask him out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And you're not gonna do that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's right! 'Cause that would give him the control! So now he's all ooh, coming up with this whole I've got a party thing y'know, trying to get me to hint around for an invitation. Blew up in his face, didn't it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, there's a party. There's a party. But the power, that is still up for grabs. You follow me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think so. Se, he-he's not inviting you to his party because he likes you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Love what you've done with the place.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, yeah I know, I know, it's a lot of boxes, but again I really appreciate you guys letting me stay here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Not a problem. And listen, hey! Since you're gonna be here for a while, why don't—I was thinking we uh, put your name on the answering machine.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I uh, hope you don't mind, I kinda uh, jazzed it up a little. Check this out. We will, we will, call you back!

utterance.speaker: Larry
utterance.content: Oh, will you mind if I wash up? Because I came straight from work and who knows where these babies have been.

utterance.speaker: Larry
utterance.content: Just walking past the kitchen I saw 10 violations! I'm shutting this place down!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You have the power to do that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You built a fort didn't ya?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God, the air purifier! Ross's air purifier! All I heard through 4 years of college was

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, you should've gone out once and a while.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on, Chandler, Ross is our friend. He needs us right now, so why don't you be a grown up and come and watch some TV in the fort!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Hey guys, I just uh, wanted to invite you to the party tomorrow night.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, thanks! We'll try to stop by.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, actually, I think I'm gonna be busy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! Remember I got that uh, gala.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Okay, hope I see you tomorrow night.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Walked right into that one didn't he?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What one? You wanted him to invite you to the party and he did it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, but he waited until the last minute! So if I said yes, he would know I had nothing better to do than wait around for an invitation to his stupid party. I said, "No!" Which puts me right back in the driver seat.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Great. So the ball is in his court?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Wanna play some foosball? Please?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no, no! We have to move the table into my room, yeah! 'Cause of all the boxes. Come on!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, I have one question. What is the deal with this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Um-hmm! Look, I-I-I don't know how much more of this I can take! Did you know he taped over my Baywatch tape with some show about bugs! My God! What if that had been porn?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right look, y'know, this maybe tough but come on, this is Ross! I survived college with him!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, I guess I can hold out a little longer. Let's have a game.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, so he's out of here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You guys got anything to eat? I just went down to Johnos for some chicken and it was closed!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I took Larry there to eat but it was all violated. So we shut it down!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pheebs, if this guy keeps closing down all of our favorite places, where are we gonna eat?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Don't let him in! I'm supposed to be at a regatta gala.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We'll be right there! Can't you just say it starts later?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? What kind of a regatta gala starts at night?!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Hey, hi, I need a ladle. You got a ladle?

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Thanks, see you at the party.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, guys, you know what Larry would say? He would say, "See you ladle."

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I-I-I'm done with this. You want anything Ross? Sports? International? Apartment listings?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh that's mine too! I'm Italian!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I guess I can check out those apartment listings, even though there's never anything in here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah! You're—hey, you're right! Here's an affordable place, two bedroom, close to work, ooh, it's available in five weeks!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I-I don't know, it's kind of expensive for a studio.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But it's available now! Isn't it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, let's go look at it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-oh-ooh, hey guys, I was wondering if you guys would uh, maybe chip in on some new air filters for the air purifier? I mean after all, we all are using it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, well look at this kitchen, slash bathroom. Well that's great! Y'know so you can cook while in the tub.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Somebody was using his head. Hey, let's check out the rest of the place.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think this is it. I don't know, maybe we should keep looking.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But hey, Ross, this place is available now!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, you don't want to be stuck with us for the next five weeks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, you-you think I should go ahead and take this place?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, I see what you guys are saying. I'll uh, I'll go downstairs and fill out an application.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He knew we were trying to get rid of him. He knew! You think we could get a bathtub in our kitchen?

utterance.speaker: Larry
utterance.content: Great! How about you wanted to go the Italian place down on Bleaker Street right?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, I love that place! So, no.

utterance.speaker: Larry
utterance.content: I wonder how long that milk has been setting out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, no-no, this place is totally healthy! That—this milk is mine. I bought this today, 'cause I was thirsty for milk, y'know. Okay, let's go!

utterance.speaker: Larry
utterance.content: Hey, buddy! Are you familiar with Section 11-B of the Health Code that requires all refuse material out the back exit?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: But then I'd have to go all the way around the dry cleaner place.

utterance.speaker: Larry
utterance.content: Oh, so you're saying you'd choose convenience over health?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, stop! Larry, okay, can't you just be Larry and not Larry the health inspector guy? Y'know I mean it was really exciting at first but now it's like, okay, so where are we gonna eat ever?

utterance.speaker: Larry
utterance.content: Well, I suppose I could give him a warning.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank you. Okay, go! Go! Go! Now, if after dinner you still really need to bust someone, I know a hot dog vendor who picks his nose.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe, maybe we did a good thing, helping Ross get back on his feet!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes that was a nice place!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not a lot of closet space, but he can just hang his stuff out the window in a bag!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hello! Oh yeah! It's the apartment manager; Ross put us down as references. Ross is the greatest guy you'll ever meet! Yeah, he's very reliable.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Of course he has this big huge dog! That uh, barks into the night. Well, who doesn't love dogs? Ah, he's a tap dancer! Yes, some would say that is a lost art. He's a pimp! There you go! Yes, he's a pimp. He's a big, tap dancing pimp! Hello?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Shoot, shoot, this is never gonna work! He's right there!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Just go over and say hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I have to go downstairs and come back up as if I'm coming home from the regatta gala. Okay? So just go distract him. But don't be sexy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, it's a great party! Great food. Y'know, most parties it's all chips and salsa, chips and salsa. So umm, what's this?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Oh right, tonight was your party.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Oh wow, you look great! Glad you could make it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh well, y'know, the gala had to end sometime.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Don't go anywhere, I'll be right back.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, sure. All right, whose court is the ball in now?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I thought there wasn't a ball?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, come on! He's glad that I came, he doesn't want me to go anywhere, balls flying all over the place!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Rachel, this is my friend Tom. This is the girl I told you about.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, go on! You telling people about me?

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: You two could really hit it off! I'm gonna go mingle.

utterance.speaker: Tom
utterance.content: So you work at Bloomingdale's, huh? My mom calls it Bloomies.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, it's all right, you can just drop the act Tommy. I know what's going on here. Your Danny's wingman right? You guys are best buds. Frat bros!

utterance.speaker: Tom
utterance.content: I'm gonna go talk to uh, a friend.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, you go talk to your friend. You tell him, "Nice try."

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Man! He just keeps lobbing them up and I just keep knocking them right out of the park!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think I need a drink.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, I'm telling ya! I'm fine!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Here we go! Here we go!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey. So I uh, I didn't get that apartment. Some problem with my application.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. But, the good news is that Phoebe said that I could stay at her place for a while. So…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But you can't stay with Phoebe, Ross! We're-we're roomies!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, you guys don't need me here taking up your space.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, we got plenty of space! There-there's still some over there by-by that speaker. Please, just stay!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you guys sure about this?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! Ross, you have to stay!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So I'm a pimp huh? It's okay! Look, I know that sometimes I can be a pain in the ass, but you just have to talk to me. Tell me if something is bothering you. Okay? And for my part I will do everything I can to keep my annoying habits just .

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I see you've had a very productive day. Don't you think the cowboy hat is a little much?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right! Isn't this a woman's hat?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, stop talking crazy and make us some tea!
